spatial_accuracy.notes: General room layout is maintained but font stretching suggests minor proportion distortion in the master bed area and foyer. Window openings on the right elevation align with the source.

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thicknesses are mostly consistent. The transition between the Dining/Bed Room 2 wall shows slight alignment drift compared to the source blueprint.

furniture_mapping.notes: Excellent mapping of furniture layouts, including specific chair placements and kitchen appliance spots. Scale remains consistent across rooms.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean isometric projection with clear lighting. Text rendering is slightly blurred/distorted due to the perspective warp applied to the 2D source textures.

detected_errors.description: Minor proportion distortion in the Master Bedroom and Foyer area, visible through the stretched text labels.
Slight misalignment of the internal wall separating the dining area from Bed Room 2 relative to the external wall anchor.
Rendering artifact where the 2D text label 'Utility 5'9'' Wide' is partially obscured or warped at the bottom edge.
